Class.ClassComment: OperatorParameterDRLBuilder /** * Utility interface to define an operation to build DRL for a given set of parameters. The only existing use-case at present is to supplement CEP operators with additional meta-information. */

Method.MethodComment: /** * Generate Operator DRL for the given parameters. The parameter Map is not pruned and contains all entries made by the Widget corresponding to the type of operator for which DRL is being built. * @param parameters * @return */
